type.description: Provisioning Key. Applicable values: ASSET_NO_KEY, ASSET_PLAIN_KEY

data.description: Provisioning Key. Accepts hex string or path to binary file. If no key is provided, set the value to 'null'

type.description: Code Encryption Key. Applicable values: ASSET_NO_KEY, ASSET_PLAIN_KEY

data.description: Code Encryption Key. Accepts hex string or path to binary file. If no key is provided, set the value to 'null'

nv_counter.description: Non-Volatile counter corresponding to the software version
